评论详情: True to size. Very flattering on. Comfy!
Wanted a casual top to match athletic pants. This one met the bill. Soft heathered color and texture. Cut and fit are nice. Recommend this vendor & this item.
Great for chubby people it fits great without looking like a trash bag LOL
Love this, so comfortable

评论概述: Cute and comfortable, a little short
评论详情: This top is cute, and the waffle weave makes it cool and breathable to wear.  I took off one star because it’s shorter than pictured. It looks great with jeans but I can’t wear it with leggings, which I was hoping for.
A little bit short but I like it. Beautiful color.
I love the fit, the material is light but you can’t see thru. I got the green, exactly like it was shown. Definitely checking out their brand for more pleasant surprises.
Nice material, size is,perfect to use as a top layer. Color is just what I had  hoped for.
Fabric is satisfactory but very light weight and see through, and wrinkles easily.

The photos show that you can kind of see the red shirt in holding through the weave, as it's more open than I expected.  However, it's very cute, comfortable, and will be adorable over a swimsuit or cute sports bra or crop top in the summer! Definitely a very cool shirt to wear, and absolutely will not keep you warm.  It fits loose, but true to size (xl).

I do like the color this top came in the only problem is the fit is big as I did size down to have a better fit I wanted to ware this with leggings as could be a relaxing look but the top is too baggy for me
This is a cute, high quality top. It is a little thin, so I will wear a shirt under it.

I ordered this top for my GF, these are her thoughts: I recently received this Dokotoo waffle knit shirt sleeve shirt with a hood and drawstrings, and as simple as it is, it is one of my go-to pieces. The first thing I noticed was the charming v-neck design, complemented by a couple of decorative buttons that add just the right amount of flair without being overly flashy. The material is thinner than I expected, which makes it perfect for layering. It’s breathable enough to wear during transitional seasons while still providing that cozy feel we all love. I appreciate that it runs true to size; I opted for my usual size, and it fits perfectly without being too tight or too loose. The versatility of this shirt is impressive. I’ve styled it in various ways – from pairing it with high-waisted jeans for a casual day out to wearing it under a denim jacket for a chic layered look. The hood and drawstrings give it a relaxed vibe, making it ideal for those laid-back days when comfort is key. Highly recommended for anyone looking to enhance their casual collection.

This is a great casual waffle knit top that is lightweight and really comfortable.  The design is flattering with a simple straight cut hemline and button front neck.  I love the addition of the hood, though the drawstring came out in the first wash.  It was too much of a hassle to put back in and luckily it looks fine without the strings.  The waffle knit is thin and a bit see through, so i found nudes bra or undershirt worked best with it.  I typically wear a S/M top and ordered this one in a S.  I think the size up would have fit more like the model pictures, but the shirt is cut a little baggier so the smaller size still worked fine.

I love a top that I can just throw on with a pair of jeans and know I look nice but it's also carefree.  That's what you get with this top. It's so pretty and the waffle fabric makes this top look like you have put in extra work to look nice.  Anything that saves me time and looks stunning as well, I'm here for. The material is soft. The buttons are appropriately sized to open the top button or close. That's just a personal preference.  On nights I have to run in and change into a top and jeans for a football game or activity at the school for the kids, this fits the bill. I look great.  If I'm home relaxing on Saturdays watching football with my husband and I'm in sweats or yoga pants for comfort, this shirt fits the bill for that also.  The versatility of this top is what I love most about it. Plus, it's just so pretty and comfortable. You can't go wrong with that. I may have to buy a couple more.

Dokotoo has made a nice summer weight waffle shirt with short sleeves and also a hoodie.  The navy blue color is attractive.  Sizing is true, and there were no obvious flaws in either the material or stitching.  There was no odor upon opening the shrink wrap bag.  The sleeves are elbow length, which works well with the hood.  Pricing is fair.

评论概述: Heavy textured material, but breathable and not too hot.
评论详情: Heavy textured material, but breathable and not too hot.  Good quality material.  Fits true to size.  Would order again.

This is suprisingly soft, stretchy and comfy. I love the color, the hood is stylin’ with the short sleeves.  I’ve never put on a waffle knit  top that made me feel so good … ever!  It’s mostly polyester and it’s just got a lot of stretch and it bounces right back into shape! This is going to be a staple in my wardrobe and I’m not going to wait for warmer weather to enjoy it. Im going to wear it over some coordinating long sleeve tops during the cooler weather.
This is soft, and the sizing is perfect.  Lightweight for cooler weather but can be layered for colder weather.  It is well made and is the perfect casual shirt.  I'll be ordering some more

Dokotoo is one of my favorite brands.  This shirt is a really nice gray color, well made and the material is good.  It’s a bit lighter than similar shirts I have gotten from them, but it still appears to be a decent quality over all.  The waffle style I like, but it’s a more casual, every day shirt.  Not dressy.  It fits true to size and is a good length for me….mid-butt.  I could see giving this as a gift too.  I think it will wear reasonably well.  Cold water washes and gentle cycle makes my clothes last longer.

This is a good lightweight spring and summer top, but just a bit thinner than I expected. It is a beautiful knit weave that is cool in warm weather and nice to layer for Fall. They describe it as a waffle knit but it’s more elegant and thinner than a thermal type waffle knit. It has a unique texture that looks fabulous for casual wear and is very comfortable. I’m 5’4”, 130 lbs and I got the small in Beau Blue. It fits true to size, not tight at all. I probably could have gone with a medium but wasn’t sure since it’s described as oversized. The fabric has a nice smooth drape and is made out of 95% polyester and 5% elastane. It comes in 10 different colors.

评论概述: So Cute and perfect for adding a sweater over it.
评论详情: So Cute and perfect for adding a sweater over it. Color is beautiful. Will be adding the others to my bag.

I love a good short sleeve hoodie top and this is adorable. The cut and fit make this top look really good on, even though it’s not form fitting.  It just doesn’t make you look boxy or unflattering. It super comfortable to wear too (fabric is 95% Polyester, 5% Elastane).  I usually wear a size medium but got this in a large as I usually size up in outerwear and I love the way it fits. This is a great buy and I highly recommend.
Nice waffle pattern summer top with a hoodie perfect for casual wear. The fit is true to size and it’s super comfy. Great buy!

Goes well with jeans or slacks.  It's thin so wearable in warmer temperatures but may need to wear a light shirt underneath.  Wearing a layer under this makes it usable late winter through early winter.

What a find for me.  I love wearing any type of sweaters and/or shirts with hoods.  This one was a plus for me because this item is short-sleeved and I'm so grateful for that.  It's very soft (the waffle knit).  I have several DOKOTOO sweaters and knit tops (all hoodies) but this one is the first with short sleeves and I'm totally loving this.  Another great find on Amazon and I do recommend this beauty.

评论概述: Super soft and comfy to wear
评论详情: Great value for the price… So comfy to wear and it’s super cute… Flattering… True to size fit. I am a large.

The knit fabric is light enough for summer wear yet heavy enough to keep the chill off your shoulders.  I like the casual style to this. Fits extremely well being true to size. Washed and dries nicely with no shrinkage. Highly recommend!

I was very impressed with this top.  It is super comfortable to wear, fits nicely, and it is much more flattering than expected.  The details are very well done and I like that it's not too heavy.  Very attractive when paired with jeans.

This top looks a little boxy versus the length and style of the model.  It is not as long as pictured, perhaps my wife should have ordered a large.  It is true to size with a medium.  The waffle fabric is heavier than most summer fabrics.  The style with the hood is nice and will look great with capris or shorts.

评论概述: Summer Waffle Knit Short Sleeve Tops
评论详情: This blouse is light weighted, breathable and comfortable. This top  is very simple and stylish.  Material is soft,  elastic, Skin-friendly.  Size fits as expected on the chart.

The picture shows a very cute - and seemingly well constructed - Spring/ Summer top... well it's not. The shirt shown in the pictures must've been starched to get it to maintain it's shaped because this shirt is see through and very flimsy. I thought it would be so cute for the Spring but I'll probably only wear it around the house. Very disappointed with it.

I really like this shirt and it's very well made and gorgeous material. I was a bit disappointed because one of the reasons besides it being a hoodie I got it was because of how deep the V neck was along with the buttons. I like to layer my shirts and I like to show off pretty lace under shirts, so the deeper the V the more I like it, well this barely, barely has a V in it. On the model it shows a deep V then the buttons. It's not like that in real like. The V ends like at your collar bones.  Now this shirt is a nice fabric, it's actually pretty soft and the way it's made you absolutely could wear it all year round. I got the green color and it's beautiful. It also runs true to size!
